I had mixed feelings for "Les Valseuses" (1974) written and directed by Bertrand Blier when I started watching it but I ended up loving it. "Les Valseuses" was originally a novel that was initially republished as a 535-page newspaper and reworked again for films by Blier. The new film version is pruned of enough material to run a good length with added found footage.
